data.title: Richmark Properties, Inc.
data.meta_description: Richmark Properties, Inc. has been serving the state of TX, for over thirty-five years.
data.text:
Richmark Properties, Inc. has been providing third party property management services throughout the State of Texas since 1989, and the State of Oklahoma since 2019.

Sandra Prikryl, Co-Owner and CEO of the company, began her career in July of 1988, as a part time leasing consultant while attending UTA. She then joined Richmark Properties in August of 1992, and during this tenure, was promoted through all operational positions. Sandra has first-hand experience on what her operational staff deal with on a daily basis, making her most relatable. Sandra is a licensed Broker in 11 states and holds a CPM certification.

Julie Lewis, Co-Owner and CFO, has over 25 years of experience with accounting and business management. She began her career in accounting as a bookkeeper at a restaurant while she was waiting tables through college. After graduating with a BBA in Finance, she worked at Dell Computers and for a few mortgage loan brokers. Julie joined the property management community in 2006 when she was head of an accounting department for a commercial management company. In 2008, Julie joined the Richmark family where she was the Controller for over 14 years before becoming CFO. Julie oversees all aspects of the Finance and HR teams of Richmark.

Together, Sandra and Julie strive to motivate and inspire their employees through their continuous strength and guidance. They have built and continue to grow Richmark to provide the best for their employees, owners and communities.

Sandra, Co-Owner and CEO of Richmark Properties, began her career in 1988 as a part time leasing consultant while attending college. She joined Richmark in July of 1992, and during this tenure, has worked in all operational positions. This hands on experience provides great opporutnity to mentor and effectively lead her team. Sandra is a licensed Broker in 11 states and holds a CPM certification. She is strong-minded and wills for not only her success but of the people around her as well. Sandra leads her team with grace and Richmark would not be what it is today without her.

Julie has been the Controller since joining Richmark Properties in 2008. She earned her BBA in Finance from Southwest Texas State University and has more than 25 years of experience with accounting and business management. She also has over 10 years of experience with a non-profit organization that she co-founded. Recently, Julie has become Co-Owner and CFO of Richmark Properties. She is responsible for all aspects of the accounting cycle and human resources. This includes accurate and timely financial reporting and analysis, banking and cash management, cash flow forecasting, accounts payable, payroll and employee benefits. Additional responsibilities she brings to the team include development of policies and procedures for Richmark. Julie is an exceptional leader who motivates her employees while also keeping them task-oriented, Richmark Properties is lucky to have her.

Peyton started her journey with Richmark in 2017 as an Admin Assistant to Richmark's Controller. While in college, she became fascinated by social media analytics and brought a proposal for a 2022 media approach to the President. Peyton is now the Marketing Manager for Richmark Properties, Inc. and is responsible for increasing brand awareness, interacting with properties, planning digital campaigns to build on the sense of community and loyalty, analyzing engagement data to identify trends in customer interactions, and reputation management. She remains a Corporate Admin and has recently gained another title under her belt, Personal Relations. She handles the celebration of birthdays, anniversaries, national holidays, and most importantly - Richmark's employees. Peyton is a vital member of our Operations and Adminustration teams and brings a positive and enthusiastic attitude to Richmark.

Julie has 19 years of experience in the multi-housing industry and acquired her real estate license in 2022. Julie has exceptional customer service and has led several management companies and their teams through her training and mentorship. Her attention to detail and experience with Class A investments has been essential when assisting owners and investors in creating value through property enhancements. Major accomplishments have also included full rehabs and renovations on several properties. Part of her success has been the result of evaluating and elevating the companies' teams for a higher standard of success. Her personal business goal is to bring the highest level of value to Richmark Properties owners and investors.
